title: *Reduced one final time*FS FT N172  Wild Bill Hutchinson

posts.post_title: *Reduced one final time*FS FT N172  Wild Bill Hutchinson
posts.post_content:
Trying one last reduction before these go to the wilds of Ebay on 15 August.

Baldwin is sharp with writing on back. Hutchinson is short with pinholes and writing on back. Prices are net to me.

Thanks as always!

Paul

Baldwin *sold*
Hutchinson $185


Would also consider trade for similar condition N172 Dwyer or N300 Kennedy

Prices reduced 

Thanks as always 

Paul

posts.post_title: *Reduced one final time*FS FT N172 OJ Fido Baldwin & Wild Bill Hutchinson

PM early, PM often =)
